Record Class LineSegment

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
Simulator.LineSegment
public record LineSegment(Point p1, Point p2) extends Record
Class LineSegment used to form Shapes
Version:
1.0.0 16/02/2023 The two points must have different coordinates
Author:
Jude Adam

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
